title: Bullet-Hole-Window
body:
<<thinkingFont Dialogue>>
There's a crack in the window here.
Hmm. Looks like it was caused by a bullet...
<<set $foundClues to true>>
<<set $bulletholeFound to true>>
<<if $foundSuspects is true and $foundClues is true>>
    <<set $CanTravel to true>>
<<endif>>
<<endThinkingFont Dialogue>>
